name: Sure Cuts A Lot Version 4 Project

description: Sure Cuts A Lot is an app that allows you to import artwork and create custom designs, then cut them with electronic cutting machines. The SCUT4 file is the primary file type associated with version 4 of Sure Cuts A Lot.

Each version of Sure Cuts A Lot saves projects with a .scut file extension and a number indicating the version of Sure Cuts A Lot that created it. For example, version 3 of Sure Cuts A Lot creates a project with the .scut3 file extension.

common_filenames.description: Untitled.scut4 - The default name given to a new project by Sure Cuts A Lot 4 until the user renames it.
